# xsettings


| 採用方案 |
| --- |
| [xsettingsd](xsettings/xsettingsd) |
| [xfsettingsd](xsettings/xfsettingsd) |


## 探索

執行

``` sh
apt-cache search xsettings
```

顯示

```
gnome-settings-daemon - daemon handling the GNOME session settings
cinnamon-settings-daemon - daemon handling the Cinnamon session settings
libxsettings-client-dev - utility functions for the Xsettings protocol (Development files)
libxsettings-client-doc - utility functions for the Xsettings protocol (Documentation)
libxsettings-client0 - utility functions for the Xsettings protocol (GPE)
libxsettings-dev - Xsettings protocol (development files)
libxsettings0 - Xsettings protocol library for GPE
lxde-settings-daemon - xsettings compliant configuration manager for LXDE
mate-settings-daemon - daemon handling the MATE session settings
mate-settings-daemon-common - daemon handling the MATE session settings (common files)
mate-settings-daemon-dev - daemon handling the MATE session settings (development files)
ukui-settings-daemon - daemon handling the UKUI session settings
ukui-settings-daemon-common - daemon handling the UKUI session settings (common files)
unity-settings-daemon - daemon handling the Unity session settings
xfce4-settings - graphical application for managing Xfce settings
xsettingsd - Provides settings to X11 applications
```
